name: Card Miner
description:
Welcome to the captivating world of Card Miner! Prepare to embark on an enchanting journey where every draw from the deck holds the promise of rare and stunning beauties from the realm of anime. Our clicker game brings together the thrill of collecting while immersing you in a vibrant universe filled with diverse characters, each more alluring than the last.

With each card you draw, anticipate the rush of excitement as you hope to uncover a rare gem among the deck. These rare cards aren't just visually striking; they are gateways to fascinating worlds, each accompanied by detailed character information, including vital stats such as height, weight, age, likes, dislikes, and unique abilities.

As you delve deeper into the game, you'll discover that the abilities of these rare beauties are more than just cosmetic enhancements. They stack and synergize, amplifying your progression as you draw non-rare cards. Watch as your points soar with each strategic draw, propelled by the combined powers of your growing collection.

Immerse yourself in the addictive allure of Card Miner and experience the joy of collecting while unlocking the mysteries of these captivating characters. Begin your journey today and let the cards reveal the secrets they hold!
